import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useMemo } from "react"; import { getCartProducts, removeCartProduct } from "../features/apiProvider"; function CartItem({ product }) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleDelete = () => { dispatch(removeCartProduct(product.id)) }; return (
navigate(`../products/${product.id}`, { state: product }) } />

{product.name}

{product.description.slice(0, 100)}...

₹ {product.price}
); } function CartPage() { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getCartProducts()) }, [dispatch]) const products = useSelector((state) => state.cart.cart); const cartQuantity = products.length const total = useMemo(() => { return products.reduce( (total, product) => total + parseFloat(product.price), 0 ); }, [products]); return products.length === 0 ? ( <>

Shopping Cart

{products.length} items in your cart

Cart is empty!! Add something

) : ( <>

Shopping Cart

{cartQuantity} items in your cart

{products.map((product) => ( ))}
Product Price/unit Quantity

Total Amount:

₹ {total}

Checkout
Continue Shopping
); } export default CartPage;
